name: The Last of Bus
description:
Keep yourself busy while you wait for the bus. Fullscreen recommended!
Controls: Mouse!

Known bugs (didn't have time for) include:
Movement can be tricky on very large screens.
Character moonwalks occationally. - Hey, it's for style points!
Sometimes, talking with NPCs does not update their bubbles correctly - Walking away and talking again should update it correctly!
